short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple Calculator is a popup tool for quick, essential calculations, supporting addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple Calculator is a user-friendly tool designed to facilitate quick calculations in a convenient popup window. It supports essential arithmetic operations, including addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division. The interface is straightforward, enabling users to perform calculations efficiently without unnecessary distractions. Ideal for everyday tasks, Simple Calculator provides a reliable solution for users needing a fast and accessible way to handle basic mathematical functions.
